subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Variant and Japanese {{Han simp|綠|f=彔|t=录}}.

In current form, {{Han compound|糸|录|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}}

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|緑%衣|りょく%い}}: green [[robe]]s; by extension, a [[parrot]]
* {{ja-r|緑%陰|りょく%いん}}, {{ja-r|緑%蔭|りょく%いん}}: the [[shade]] of a tree, a [[shady]] [[nook]]
* {{ja-r|緑%雨|りょく%う}}: an early [[summer]] [[rain]], a rain in [[May]]
* {{ja-r|緑%営|りょく%えい}}: one of the [[regular]] [[army]] groups in China during the Qing Dynasty
* {{ja-r|緑%猿|みどり%ざる}}: the [[green monkey]], {{taxlink|Chlorocebus sabaeus|species|ver=180114}}
* {{ja-r|緑%黄|りょく%おう}}: [[greenish]] [[yellow]]
* {{ja-r|緑%化|りょく%か}}, {{ja-r|緑%化|りょっ%か}}: [[greening]], [[tree]]-[[plant]]ing
* {{ja-r|緑%化 運%動|りょっ%か うん%どう}}: a [[greening]] or [[tree]]-[[plant]]ing [[campaign]]
* {{ja-r|緑%眼|りょく%がん}}: green [[eye]]s, [[green-eyed]]
* {{ja-r|緑%岩|りょく%がん}}: green [[stone]]; green [[metamorphic]] [[rock]]
* {{ja-r|緑%旗|りょっ%き}}: one of the [[regular]] [[army]] groups in China during the Qing Dynasty
* {{ja-r|緑%玉|りょく%ぎょく}}: a green [[jewel]]; [[poetic]] name for [[bamboo]]
* {{ja-r|緑%児|みどり%ご}}, {{ja-r|緑%児|りょく%じ}}: a [[young]] [[child]] under the age of three, particularly under the old Taihō Code of ancient Japan
* {{ja-r|緑%酒|りょく%しゅ}}: [[fresh]] [[sake]] ([[rice wine]])
* {{ja-r|緑%樹|りょく%じゅ}}: a [[healthy]] [[tree]] with [[lush]] green [[leaf|leaves]]
* {{ja-r|緑%綬 褒%章|りょく%じゅ ほう%しょう}}: a [[medal of honor]] with a green [[ribbon]] to [[signify]] [[virtuous]] [[conduct]]
* {{ja-r|緑%十%字|りょく%じゅう%じ}}: the Green Cross, a play on the [[Red Cross]] and a [[symbol]] in Japan of [[industrial]] [[health]] and [[safety]]
* {{ja-r|緑%女|りょく%じょ}}: a [[girl]] under the age of three under the Taihō Code of ancient Japan; a young girl
* {{ja-r|緑 小灰蝶|みどり しじみ}}: a type of [[butterfly]], {{taxlink|Neozephyrus japonicus|species|ver=180114}}
* {{ja-r|緑%色|りょく%しょく}}: the [[color]] [[green]]
* {{ja-r|緑%水|りょく%すい}}: green [[water]]
* {{ja-r|緑%青|ろく%しょう}}: [[verdigris]], the [[oxidation]] of [[copper]]
* {{ja-r|緑%石|みどり%いし}}: a type of [[reef]] [[coral]]
* {{ja-r|緑%閃%光|りょく%せん%こう}}: [[green flash]]
* {{ja-r|緑%草|りょく%そう}}: [[lush]] green [[grass]]
* {{ja-r|緑%藻|りょく%そう}}: [[green algae]] in general
* {{ja-r|緑%藻 植%物|りょく%そう しょく%ぶつ}}: ''[[Chlorophyta]]'', a [[division]] of [[green algae]]
* {{ja-r|緑%藻%類|りょく%そう%るい}}: [[green algae]] types, as a classification in [[biology]]
* {{ja-r|緑%苔|りょく%たい}}: green [[moss]]
* {{ja-r|緑%黛|りょく%たい}}: green [[eyebrow]] paint, a type of [[cosmetic]]
* {{ja-r|緑啄木鳥|あおげら}}: the {{vern|Japanese green woodpecker}}, {{taxlink|Picus awokera|species|ver=180114}}
* {{ja-r|緑%地|りょく%ち}}: a [[wooded]] area
* {{ja-r|緑%地%化 計%画|りょく%ち%か けい%かく}}:　an [[afforestation]] [[plan]]
* {{ja-r|緑%地%帯|りょく%ち%たい}}: a [[greenbelt]]
* {{ja-r|緑%竹|りょく%ちく}}: [[lush]] green [[bamboo]]
* {{ja-r|緑%茶|りょく%ちゃ}}: [[green tea]]
* {{ja-r|緑%柱%玉|りょく%ちゅう%ぎょく}}: a [[beryl]] [[crystal]] or [[jewel]]: an [[emerald]]
* {{ja-r|緑%柱%石|りょく%ちゅう%せき]}}: the [[mineral]] [[beryl]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|緑%虫|みどり%むし}}: ''[[Euglena]]'', a [[genus]] of [[unicellular]] [[flagellate]] [[protist]]s.
* {{ja-r|緑%虫 植%物|みどり%むし しょく%ぶつ}}: {{taxlink|Euglenoidea|class|ver=180114}}/{{taxlink|Euglenophyceae|class|ver=180114}}, a [[class]] of [[unicellular]] [[flagellate]] [[protist]]s.
* {{ja-r|緑%泥|りょく%でい}}: a green [[mud]] containing [[significant]] amounts of [[chlorite]]
* {{ja-r|緑%泥%石|りょく%でい%せき}}: [[chlorite]]s, a group of [[phyllosilicate]] [[mineral]]s
* {{ja-r|緑%泥 片%岩|りょく%でい へん%がん}}: [[chlorite]] [[schist]]
* {{ja-r|緑%土|りょく%ど}}: a [[wooded]] area
* {{ja-r|緑%豆|りょく%ず}} {{ja-r|緑%豆|りょく%とう}}: alternate name for the {{ja-r|八重生|ヤエナリ}}, the [[mung bean]]
* {{ja-r|緑%内%障|りょく%ない%しょう}}: [[glaucoma]]
* {{ja-r|緑%波|りょく%は}}: a green [[wave]]
* {{ja-r|緑%髪|りょく%はつ}}: healthy and shiny black hair; a [[euphemism]] for a [[monk]] or [[nun]]
* {{ja-r|緑鳩|あおばと}}: the {{vern|Japanese green pigeon}}, ''[[Treron sieboldii]]''
* {{ja-r|緑%肥|りょく%ひ}}: [[green manure]]
* {{ja-r|緑%肥 作%物|りょく%ひ さく%もつ}}: the [[plants]] or [[crop]] used to make [[green manure]]
* {{ja-r|緑%蕪|りょく%ぶ}}: [[lush]] green [[grass]] or [[weeds]]
* {{ja-r|緑%風|りょく%ふう}}: the soft [[breeze]]s of late spring and early summer: [[zephyr]]
* {{ja-r|緑%風%会|^りょく%ふう%かい}}: Japanese a political faction formed in 1947, lasting until 1965
* {{ja-r|緑%便|りょく%べん}}: green [[stool]] or [[feces]], such as that produced by children suffering from [[digestive]] problems
* {{ja-r|緑%門|りょく%もん}}: an [[arched]] [[gate]] made of cedar or cypress [[bough]]s, made at times of [[celebration]]
* {{ja-r|緑%野|りょく%や}}: a [[lush]] green [[field]]
* {{ja-r|緑%葉|りょく%よう}}: green [[leaf|leaves]]
* {{ja-r|緑%葉 甘%藍|りょく%よう かん%らん}}: alternate name for {{ja-r|羽衣 甘藍|はごろも かんらん}}, [[kale]]
* {{ja-r|緑葉梟|あおばずく}}: the {{vern|brown hawk-owl}}, {{taxlink|Ninox scutulata|species|ver=180114}}
* {{ja-r|緑%羅|りょく%ら}}: [[light green]]
* {{ja-r|緑%林|りょく%りん}}: [[lush]] green [[woods]]; a [[thief]]'s or [[robber]]'s [[hideout]]; by extension, [[thief|thieves]] or [[robber]]s
* {{ja-r|緑%簾%石|りょく%れん%せき}}: [[epidote]], a [[calcium]] [[aluminum]] [[iron]] [[sorosilicate]] [[mineral]]: Ca<sub>2</sub>Al<sub>2</sub>(Fe<sup>III</sup>Al)(SiO<sub>4</sub>)(Si<sub>2</sub>O<sub>7</sub>)O(OH)
* {{ja-r|緑%礬|りょく%ばん}}, {{ja-r|緑%礬|ろう%は}}, {{ja-r|緑%礬|ろく%ばん}}: [[melanterite]], a [[mineral]] form of [[hydrous]] [[iron sulfate|iron(II) sulfate]]: FeSO<sub>4</sub>·7H<sub>2</sub>O
* {{ja-r|緑%蘿|りょく%ら}}: [[lush]] green [[ivy]] or [[vines]]
* {{ja-r|緑%衫|ろう%そう}}, {{ja-r|緑%衫|ろく%さん}}: a dark green [[coat]] worn by a sixth-ranked official in ancient Japan
* {{ja-r|緑%袍|りょく%ほう}}: a green [[overcoat]] worn by [[nobility]]; a [[noble]] [[rank]] in ancient Japan
* {{ja-r|緑%光|りょっ%こう}}: [[green flash]]
* {{ja-r|閃%緑%岩|せん%りょく%がん}}: [[diorite]]
* {{ja-r|嫩%緑|どん%りょく}}: tender [[green]]
* {{ja-r|白%緑|びゃく%ろく}}: [[whitish]] [[green]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|みどり}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=みどり}}. Originally referred to new [[bud]]s and [[shoot]]s, later changing via [[metonymy]] to mean {{m|en|green}}.

subSections.title: Noun
Synonyms
subSections.text:
* {{sense|courtesan's apprentice}} {{ja-r|禿|かぶろ}}
* {{sense|abridged performance}} {{ja-r|見%取り|み%とり|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|見%取|み%とり}}

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|緑%児|みどり%ご|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|嬰%児|みどり%ご}}: a [[baby]]
